fields.name: Total patents granted
fields.description: Total patents granted from 1790-1839, as well as 2015, based on the US Patent and Trademark Office's reported "Utility Patents" which refers to "patents for inventions." Available at: https://www.uspto.gov/web/offices/ac/ido/oeip/taf/h_counts.htm

fields.name: Chemical
fields.description: 'Chemical' patents include agriculture, food, textiles, coatings, gas, organic compounds, and resins.

fields.name: Computers & Communications
fields.description: 'Computers & communications' include communications, computer hardware and software, peripherals, information storage, electronic business methods, and software.

fields.name: Medical
fields.description: 'Medical' includes drugs, surgery, medical instruments, and biotechnology.

fields.name: Electronics
fields.description: 'Electrical & electronics' includes electrical devices, lighting, measuring, testing, nuclear, x-rays, power systems, and semiconductors.

fields.name: Mechanical
fields.description: 'Mechanical' includes materials processing & handling, metalworking, motors, engines, parts, optics, and transportation.

fields.name: Other
fields.description: 'Others' includes agriculture, farming, food, amusement devices, apparel & textile, earth working & wells, furniture, house fixtures, heating, pipes & joints, and receptacles.
